title: What is the interpretation of seeing water running completely in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadota website provides you with a complete interpretation of seeing running water in a dream and this vision is considered one of the auspicious visions. He has a lot of money, and God knows best. It is normal for a person to see a strange and unrealistic dream in his sleep, which leads to anxiety and psychological distress. And here, dear followers, we present to you the complete interpretation of seeing running water in a dream for the vessel, married women, pregnant women, and men from the books of major interpretations and visions. Interpretation of seeing running water in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that running water in a dream is complete evidence of the corruption of this act if it smells. Water is unpleasant. Also, seeing running water in a dream may indicate the disappearance of worries, sins, and misdeeds that the dreamer committed in his previous life, and God knows best. Also, seeing running water in a dream full of men may indicate food and profit that the dreamer will earn from his trade in the coming days of Umrah. The interpretation of seeing running water in a dream is complete for the common woman. If an ordinary girl dreams that she sees running water, this means that her situation will be fine and that her future affairs will be resolved peacefully and gently, and God knows best. Also, seeing running water in a dream can indicate success and success that she will achieve in Your next life and abundance of food. Also, seeing running water in a dream indicates good news and happiness in her coming life and her future marriage, and God knows best. Seeing running water in a dream may indicate that she supports her fiancé, and this vision is a sign of a marriage contract and marriage soon, God willing. What is it? Interpretation of seeing running water for a married woman? Seeing running water indicates the presence of health problems, but if a woman sees herself bathing in muddy water, this is a sign of bad circumstances. Also, seeing running water in a dream indicates achieving the goals and aspirations that the woman seeks in her life. , as well as marital happiness. Also, seeing running water in a dream may indicate that worries and sins will stop and that one will soon give birth to good offspring and a lot of good news. The interpretation of seeing running water in a dream is complete for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream full of running water means facilitating her affairs in a way. General and also that she will have an easy birth in the near future, and God knows best. Also, dreaming of running water, and the water was very hot, means that childbirth is approaching and she will enjoy good health and soon she will enjoy good health. Seeing running water in a dream is complete for a divorced woman. The interpretation of the absolute vision of flowing Water in a dream as a whole is good news, happiness, and great evidence that worries and problems will stop. Also, seeing running water in a divorced woman’s dream is a dream worthy of praise, as it shows the abundance and goodness that she obtains. Seeing running water in a dream is complete for a man. Seeing a nice person in his dream If he sees fast-flowing water, this indicates that the dreamer’s wishes have been fulfilled and that he is happy and cheerful. Seeing running water in the dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing names in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing names in a dream or a dream, via the website roy2a.com. Seeing names in a dream indicates many meanings that depend on the name. If the name denotes good, it denotes good fortune and good news, and if the name denotes bad, it means sadness and distress. For unmarried men and young men, as well as for divorced women and widows, and presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad bin Shirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, and Al-Nabulsi. And other performers in ancient and modern times, so please follow us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing names in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a name denotes justice in a dream. It means the end of injustice and oppression and the attainment of rights. Seeing the Most Beautiful Names of God in a dream announces the dreamer’s goodness and justice and the death of sadness. And worry. The dream is one of the names of the prophets in a dream. It indicates patience, endurance, and overcoming adversity and obstacles. Seeing a name indicates happiness in a dream. It shows hearing good news, overcoming adversity, and losing sadness. See also: Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing names in a single woman’s dream? If she sees a girl The name Alia or a name that indicates a high position in a dream, indicates achieving goals and a high position according to the dream, and opening high positions. Seeing a girl’s name has a meaning or indicates happiness or success in a dream. It indicates good luck, success, and success in her life and hearing news that makes her happy. And joyful. If a girl sees a name from the household or her name changes to a name from the household, it indicates righteousness, piety, guidance, obedience to God, and the satisfaction of one’s desires. See also: The interpretation of seeing someone harming you in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing names in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees In a dream, one of her sons was named after one of the prophets, and it indicates the son’s righteousness, avoidance of sins, guidance, and the uprightness of his condition. If a married woman sees that her name has changed to one of the names of the Messenger’s daughters in a dream, it indicates the stability and goodness of her married life. The vision of a married woman Among the beautiful names of God, it indicates the elimination of problems and disputes, the improvement of their living conditions, and their psychological stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone leading prayer in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing names in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees one of the names of the prophets Muhammad, Joseph, or Jesus in a dream, it indicates ease of childbirth. And the birth of a boy who enjoys beauty and a prominent status in old age. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream names that indicate joy and happiness, it indicates the ease of childbirth, the cessation of pain and exhaustion, and her happiness with the baby. What is the interpretation of seeing names in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman sees names that indicate happiness and hope in a dream, it states: That you will achieve what you want, and we wish you success and hearing happy news. Seeing a name that indicates sadness and depression in a divorced dream indicates bad news, problems, and trials that she faces in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone who does not believe in God in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about naming a newborn for a pregnant woman?

title: Interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation of seeing cancer in a dream has many interpretations. It can indicate goodness and earning money and can indicate problems surrounding the dreamer, because cancer in a dream is a malignant disease that affects all parts of the body. The disease has become more common recently, but seeing the meaning of cancer in a dream is Certainly a dream that includes many meanings, as many people search for an interpretation of dreams, especially this dream, and they are very concerned about the outbreak of cancer. Follow us to learn the most important interpretation of a dream about cancer in a dream. Seeing cancer by Ibn Sirini Cancer indicates people’s complete health and recovery from the disease. Cancer in a dream also indicates that the dreamer’s continuation of life is a social personality. A woman’s vision of breast cancer indicates the presence of love and tenderness in her heart. Seeing the dreamer as having cancer and undergoing treatment indicates that he has enough sustenance, comfort and security. Seeing abdominal cancerSeeing abdominal cancer during a dream indicates that the dreamer is already suffering from psychological problems. Abdominal cancer also portends some problems and sadness and these problems will disappear after a while. Seeing cancer in the colon, liver, or intestines is evidence that the dreamer is strongly influenced by those around him. Seeing abdominal cancer also indicates that the dreamer has a precise role in his life. See Lung CancerThe dreamer who saw the dream about lung cancer turns out to be a very organized and organized person. This vision also shows He is a person who likes to plan to achieve his goals. Seeing cancer in the lungs indicates that the dreamer has a stereotypical personality and needs to change his personality so as not to be exposed to severe pressure. Dreaming of lung cancer also indicates good health. Interpretation of a dream about treating cancer: Seeing a dreamer receiving a dose of cancer treatment indicates that he He suffers from many diseases in his life. This vision shows that he has many responsibilities. Seeing a dead cancer patient. Seeing the deceased as if he had cancer indicates his outstanding debts and may indicate his need for charity and begging. This vision also shows that he died when he committed a major crime. Seeing cancer in a dream if You saw a tumor in a dream, this may indicate great benefit in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a lump in the breast also means getting money. A lump on a girl’s right hand indicates that she will get a prestigious job. If a girl sees that her body has a tumor and then she is cured of it, This indicates that her marriage is approaching. Seeing a tumor on the head in a married woman’s dream indicates a lot of thinking and a lot of heavy responsibilities, and this vision also applies to a man. Seeing a tumor indicates that you are going to work. Seeing a neck number indicates love and loyalty to the other partner. Whether for a married man or a married woman. Seeing a bump in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates good health and ease in childbirth. Seeing cancer for Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about cancer for a person close to him can indicate wrong actions that he commits and many sins and transgressions that he commits. Seeing someone close to the dreamer suffering Of cancer in a dream may indicate that the person has a bad character and is pregnant

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a face in a dream

preview.html: The dream interpretation of the face in a dream, which God Almighty created, contains many important senses for humans, such as sight, smell, hearing, and taste, but we see that the face in a dream is a thing. According to the following content, you can review the interpretation of seeing faces in dreams by major Arab commentators and scholars. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream means kindness and nourishment, hearing happy news, and showing an ugly face indicates defects, fatigue and exhaustion. The difficulties and we will deal with them in detail in this article. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s face: Ibn Sirin also explains that seeing his beautiful face in a dream indicates a person’s noble status. As for seeing ugly faces in dreams, it indicates an inappropriate attitude among people. Seeing his facial hair in a strange place expresses About anxiety and sadness. As you see a face, if it is disfigured in a dream, this indicates that you will face problems and difficulties. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing makeup in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a beautiful face: Seeing a beautiful face in a dream represents the dreamer’s happiness. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream is also a sign of money or success. Or travel. Seeing the face of a camel indicates comfort, happiness, and beauty. Seeing the faces of children in a dream indicates happiness and joy. Seeing the face of the deceased heralds good news and this is good news for the end. A beautiful face also appears in a dream to honor parents. Seeing beautiful faces in dreams symbolizes the dreamer’s good pursuit of religion and justice. And piety. Interpretation of a dream about an ugly face: Seeing an ugly face in a dream is an unfortunate vision. For the dreamer to see that his face is ugly portends dire consequences, so he should be careful. Seeing a child’s face becoming ugly indicates the presence of warnings of sadness and bad news. Seeing the face of an ugly woman in a dream shows the world her fears, exhaustion, and difficulties. See also : Interpretation of a dream about an eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about a brown face: Seeing a coffee face in a man’s dream indicates fame and power. As for seeing a black face in a dream, this indicates a mistake by the owner of the face. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a nose in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about facial wrinkles. Seeing wrinkles on the face in a dream: To see a praiseworthy dreamer, shows years of pain, hard work and patience. Blurred vision of the face in a dream shows a man that he has a lot of money. Seeing a woman’s wrinkles in a dream is to give birth to children. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s face: Seeing a face in a dream indicates Happy news. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream indicates good news. If a man sees a beautiful woman with her face in a dream, this indicates good luck, success, and success in his life. If a man sees that his face has become more beautiful than before, this indicates success and success in his life. Professionalism. If a pregnant woman sees that her face has become more beautiful than before, this indicates the ease of childbirth and her happiness with the child. Seeing a beautiful face in a married woman’s dream indicates happiness and stability in her married life. To see a beautiful face in an unmarried woman’s dream means happy news and success. And success in her life. If a divorced woman sees that her face has become pale

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person in two copies in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person with two copies in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The dreamer can see in a dream a person with two copies or a person with a similar copy in the dream. It is a dream that has many possible interpretations that vary according to the social status of the dreamer and the content of the dream. We will discuss to determine one of these interpretations, which is the interpretation of a dream. The person who sees two copies in a dream by Ibn Sirin In the following lines, we follow.Interpretation of a dream about a person seeing two copies in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about a person who sees in a dream was not revealed by Imam Ibn Sirin in his interpretation clearly and clearly, and the interpretation of dreams in general is one of the precise questions that experts confirm Researchers emphasize its importance. Not to create important decisions and conditions in life based on these interpretations, and then we list among the most prominent dream interpretations to interpret the dream for those who see it in a dream: If the dreamer sees that there is a person he knows and has two copies in the dream, this indicates that there are things that occupy the dreamer’s mind and he is uncomfortable. In his reality. If the dreamer is afraid because he saw two similar people, the dream may mean that the dreamer is entering into things and does not carry them out and is waiting for them to be not completed yet. The dreamer seeing someone who resembles him in the dream and commanding him to do good and obey is evidence of piety in the dreamer’s life and the straight path. If he sees The dreamer in the dream sees someone who resembles him and is forbidden from committing evil. The dream indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and falling behind in acts of worship, so he should quickly re-examine himself before it is too late. If a married woman sees her husband in her home, the dream may indicate the presence of disagreements and a lack of understanding between them. The couple. The dream indicates the presence of hostility and tension in the family relationship, the more confused the woman is about the recognition of her original husband by her counterpart in the dream. Interpretation of who sees two copies in a dream for a single womanIf a single girl sees in a dream that there is a person who sees two copies, then the dream indicates a number Of the meanings and interpretations that can be determined by interpreting the dream of a person who sees two copies as follows: An unmarried girl who sees a person in two copies in a dream may indicate discomfort in the girl’s relationship with this person in reality. The dream of the girl’s friend, and the same dream that she saw in the dream And the girl feels confused and cannot differentiate between them, indicating that this friend may not be loyal and devoted to the dreamer in reality. The girl who dreams of seeing a man has two copies and follows her everywhere. The dream may indicate that there are many suitors who want to marry the girl in reality. If the girl sees how she looks in the dream, this indicates the girl’s hesitation and feeling of psychological discomfort and instability in her home. Dreaming of a girl with two copies in the dream of someone she knows may mean that the girl has not decided He has yet to make a decision about the character she sees in the dream and whether he is sincere in his intention or not with a pure heart towards her. If a girl sees someone she hates in reality and he has someone like him, the dream may indicate bad actions done by the girl and inappropriate ways in her dealings with others.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flour in a dream, or as flour is called, the powder is usually made from grains such as barley, wheat, or corn, which is usually used because it is the main ingredient in many different dishes, desserts, and many pastries, and we will provide you with the interpretation of flour in a dream according to the most prominent commentators. Arabs. The interpretation of a dream about seeing flour in a dream is according to Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing flour in a dream indicates prosperity and well-being. Seeing eating flour indicates poverty. Seeing spoiled flour in a dream indicates matter. Losses. Interpretation of a dream about flour by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing flour in Fidel’s dream to obtain lawful money and abundant livelihood. Seeing barley flour in a dream means uprightness in religion and walking on the path of guidance. Seeing selling flour in a dream indicates selling the afterlife. Seeing a dreamer eating flour without bread It means poverty. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing flour in a dream by Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about flour by Al-Nabulsi: As for seeing wheat flour fermenting in a dream, it is evidence of a person’s journey to his relatives. Look at flour, as Al-Nabulsi explains, as it indicates the arrival of abundant sustenance. See Rice flour, it indicates when sustenance comes, but after toil and toil. Seeing semolina flour indicates the presence of a strong, high-ranking husband. And seeing a student flour in a dream indicates his success. Seeing flour in a dream indicates the recovery of a sick person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a loaf of bread In a dream, by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about flour for a man: Seeing spoiled flour in a dream indicates an imminent loss in reality. Seeing a man who resembles a dream indicates his financial wealth. A man’s fine vision indicates profit from trade. Seeing an expensive sale in a dream actually indicates to the dreamer In the afterlife. Seeing the fermentation of flour in a dream shows how the dreamer adheres to his religion. Seeing less fermentation of dough in the dream indicates the arrival of her livelihood, but not much. Interpretation of a dream about flour for a single woman: A girl who sees flour in a dream shows her superiority in her studies. Seeing sifted flour for a girl In the good news of her marriage to a rich man. Seeing flour in a dream for an unmarried woman means obtaining a prestigious job. See also: Interpretation of cheese in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of an expensive dream for a married woman: Seeing a large amount of flour in a dream for a married woman means that she will obtain a livelihood. Abundance comes from a great job. Seeing flour in a married woman’s dream also indicates her imminent pregnancy. Seeing flour in a married woman’s dream indicates stability in her married life. Seeing a married woman kneading flour in a dream means that good things will come to her and her family. See careful storage of a violin. The potter is for her and her future family. Seeing a married woman sprinkling flour in the rooms indicates that she will have many children. Interpretation of a dream about flour for a pregnant woman: Seeing flour in a dream indicates the safety and security of the newborn. Seeing sifting flour in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that The fetus is in good condition. See A

title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A stone in a dream. A stone is a type of rock or pebble, and it can injure a person if he throws it and sees it in a dream. Its interpretation scholars have mentioned many connotations and interpretations that differ between the dreamer. A man or a woman, or that the stone is black and white, and among the other symbols that we will explain in some detail in the following lines of the article. Stone in a dream Like a rock and does not understand what is going on around him. Imam Nabulsi - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that if he sees a stone during his sleep, it is a sign of ignorance and lack of feeling for it. Dreaming of stones inside the house means the death of a family member or being exposed to a difficult situation that he cannot bear. Also, the stone in the dream means the death of a family member or his being exposed to a difficult situation that he cannot bear. It indicates wrong speech, and if a person sees in his sleep that his heart is made of stones, then this leads to committing many prohibitions and sins that distance him from his Lord. If someone dreams that his head has turned into a pebble, this is a sign that he always adheres to his opinion and does not listen to others. The stone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - said: Seeing a stone in a dream has many interpretations, the most important of which are: The stone in a dream symbolizes the words that come out of the mouth in the event that stones appear on the wall. Seeing white pebbles during sleep means That you will hear good news in the coming days and the end of the difficult period that the dreamer is going through. If a married man dreams that he is walking on a stone in his dream, this is a sign that he has many problems and responsibilities. If someone collects stones in a dream, this is a sign that he will face Many crises in the coming days. If a young man sees a white stone in a dream, this proves that he has achieved his dreams and goals that he has been planning for a while, and satisfaction and happiness in his life. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Stone in a dream for a woman Single: White pebbles in an unmarried girl’s dream indicate his ability to achieve his desires. If a girl walks on stones while she is sleeping, this is a sign of pain and distress at this time in her life due to the crises that stand in her way, whether academically or professionally. An unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes stones falling from the sky. To the psychological exhaustion that she suffers from, and the anxiety and pain that afflicts her chest. If a girl sees during her sleep that someone is throwing pebbles at her forcefully, but she is trying to escape so as not to get hurt, this indicates that there are those who hate her, conspire against her, and want to harm her. A stone in a dream for a married woman. If a woman sees If stones fall in her dream, this means that she will face many problems in her life. If a married woman will walk on pebbles in the dream, this will lead her to live in a state of instability, which may cause her psychological harm. If she collects stones while she is sleeping, This is a sign of abundant wealth and great kindness awaiting her in the coming days. When a matzo woman dreams

title: Interpretation of a dream about wings in a dream and the symbol of wings in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wings in a dream and the symbol of wings in a dream, many interpretive scholars, including the scholar Ibn Sirin, who explained the interpretations contained in this vision, as, according to what he explained, it indicates livelihood, strength, and also carries many connotations that differ depending on the type of vision. And the color of the feathers that a person sees in a dream, they can be praiseworthy visions that convey good news to him, and in this article we will learn more about the interpretation of the dream of feathers in a dream and its symbol. Feathers in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feathers in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin also says that seeing wings is evidence of money and high positions that the dreamer will acquire. Interpretation of a dream about feathers in a dream is also: Whoever sees in a dream that he has wings and wings and flies with them. This vision is evidence of a blessed journey. And beneficial. Also, seeing feathers in a dream is a sign of accumulated money and the amount that needs care and management. As Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said that you see wings in a dream. It is evidence of sustenance and gains, because it indicates clothing and wealth after poverty. Whoever sees feathers in a dream On his body or feathers, this indicates a journey. Feathers are a sign of pride and prestige, and this depends on their density. See also: Interpretation of seeing our former house in a dream for single, pregnant and married women. Interpretation of a dream about pigeon feathers, as seeing wings in a dream varies in its interpretations and explanations, based on the type of wings That appear in the dream, as well as the details and scenes that we see in the dream, and in this paragraph we learn about them. The interpretation of the dream about pigeon feathers is as follows: If a man sees pigeon feathers in a dream. It is evidence that this man has entered a new emotional life, and it is a successful life in the beginning and not in the future. The End. Also, if an unmarried girl sees pigeon feathers in a dream. It is evidence of the happy life that this girl will live. Also, seeing a pregnant woman in a dream has the wings of a dove. It indicates the date of birth of this woman, which is approaching, and God knows best. And so does seeing feathers. In a dream for a married woman. It is evidence of life with her husband in love, happiness, security, and family stability. See also: Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream for a single and married woman according to the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing white feathers in a dream. Seeing white feathers in a dream is considered one of the positive and praiseworthy visions, as it It carries many interpretations and connotations, which are often both well and good and vary from one opinion to another. In this paragraph, we learn about the interpretation of seeing white feathers in a dream. It is also: Seeing white feathers in a person’s dream. This dream is evidence of earning a living easily and may also indicate the dreamer’s good intentions. In addition, seeing white feathers in a dream is a sign of the approaching date. Wedding or engagement. Also seeing white feathers in a dream. It is a sign of stability and happiness in the dreamer’s future, God willing. Seeing black and white feathers in the same dream. It may be evidence of the viewer’s multiple sources of livelihood. See also

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lion eating a man in a dream

preview.html: It is a terrible dream for a sleeper to see a lion eating a human in a dream, but what is its true interpretation? .. This is what we will discover together. Interpretation of a dream about a lion eating a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lion eating a man in a dream about the man: The lion, the king of the jungle, is known to be ferocious and merciless and kills everything he meets without mercy. Seeing a lion eating a man in a dream is a bad and unpleasant vision, Regardless of whether the dreamer is the person being eaten in the dream or another person. Therefore, it is a symbol of harm or misfortune that will befall those who were eaten in the dream and may symbolize the loss of that person’s right. Kidnapping people and eating them by a lion is a symbol of brutality. A ruler or a person of influence and authority who is merciless and persecutes without mercy. It symbolizes the death of that person at the hands of a person with strong influence and power, or perhaps a ruler. But if the sleeper sees that he is fighting a lion and the lion fights before it eats his flesh, this is evidence that this person will be injured. With a fever before his death. It can also symbolize that this person may be imprisoned. It can also symbolize a financial loss or the loss of a partnership that leads to heavy debts and a great financial loss. Or perhaps a fatal disease that afflicts a person that is eaten and leads to his death. But on the contrary If it is a human being who eats the lion or any part of its meat, especially the head, then this symbolizes abundant sustenance, abundance, benefit, and the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations. Interpretation of a dream about a lion eating a manIn a dream about a woman: If you see a lion eating a man in a girl’s dream Married, it will cause you trouble and sadness, especially if a lion eats you. If a married woman sees in her dream that a lion is eating her, this symbolizes the difficult problems and trials that she will go through in her family life, which will affect her negatively. Perhaps it is a symbol of the grudges and evil that will be exposed to her and the temptation that she will suffer. And she takes it and causes her problems. Or perhaps a great injustice suffered by an unjust man and a brutal enemy. Therefore, we have explained to you the different interpretations of seeing a lion eating a man in a dream, and we are happy to receive your dreams and questions through the comments or through the free dream interpretation service from Rafi’a Magazine. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about feeding a lion: Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream according to Nablus. Interpretation of a dream about a big lion for a single woman. Dream interpretation service within 24 hours.
